mod.name: ChefMod
mod.description:
Adds the Chef.
        - Play Ingredients to complete Recipes.
        - Freeze cards into a separate pile and play cards to interact with frozen cards.
        - Collect new recipes from elite enemies.

cards.name: Fried Lagavulin
cards.description:
3 chefmod:Ingredients
You may only play 1 Attack each turn. It deals double damage.

cards.name: Giant Marble Cake
cards.description:
4 chefmod:Ingredients
Draw 2 cards. ALL attacks in your hand deal 5 more damage this combat.

cards.name: Gremlin Goulash
cards.description:
4 chefmod:Ingredients
Choose a card in your hand. It gets played twice this combat.

cards.name: Nemesis Soufflé
cards.description:
4 chefmod:Ingredients

cards.name: Neow Nuggets

cards.description:
3 chefmod:Ingredients

cards.name: Nugget Strike+

cards.name: Sentry Brittle

cards.name: Stab Kabob

potions.name: Potion of Plenty
potions.description: Fetch 2 Ingredients from your draw pile. They cost 0 until played.

keywords.name: Freeze
keywords.description: Move the specified number of cards from the top of your draw pile to the frozen pile.

keywords.name: Frozen
keywords.description: Frozen cards are kept in a separate pile, and can only be played or drawn by using cards that specifically interact with Frozen cards.

keywords.name: Hunger
keywords.description: Enemies inflicted with Hunger deal half damage and take half damage from attacks for 1 turn. If an enemy already has Hunger, applying it again will deal 10 damage.

keywords.name: Ingredient
keywords.description: When you play a Recipe, random cards are marked as Ingredients. Once the required number of Ingredients are played, the Recipe's effect is triggered.

keywords.name: Prepped
keywords.description: Has additional effects if played from the leftmost spot in your hand.

keywords.name: Recipe
keywords.description: A one-time effect that is triggered when you play enough Ingredients. Recipes are activated in order.

keywords.name: Satiated
keywords.description: Enemies inflicted with Satiated deal double damage and take double damage from attacks for 1 turn. If an enemy already has Satiated, gain [E] when you apply it again.

keywords.name: Supercooled
keywords.description: Frozen cards which normally target a single enemy will specifically target this enemy.
